channel.title: looking for members for Mizu Sora Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "looking for members for Mizu Sora Village"

item.title: Re: looking for members for Storm Village
item.content:encoded: alright instead of Mizu Sora if you want a villlage you should go to storm has a stronger leader which means more experience

item.title: looking for members for Storm Village
item.content:encoded: i'm not in this village but my alt peinx12 is so anyone looking for for a brand new village to join new or possibly old members are welcome together we can try and build this village into something great, but not to discourage you I remind you this village is new and can't really offer much like other villages can at this point even if you send your alt every bit helps
